website_summaries.verdict: The iHome iDM8 is a good portable Bluetooth speaker for the money; we just like its step-up brother, the DM11, a little better.
pros: The iHome iDM8 is a distinctly designed, affordably priced, compact Bluetooth speaker that sounds decent enough and plays reasonably loud
It also has a built-in rechargeable battery and an audio input cable for non-Bluetooth devices
cons: A little short on bass and detail
a proprietary combo cable is needed for wired audio playback

customer_reviews.title: Nice little sound machine.
customer_reviews.text: I originally was going to purchase the Beats Pill for about a billion dollars, because I wanted something that would give me a lot of nice sound while I was working from home or cleaning, but wouldn't have to carry around this whole boom-box style thing. Also I'm not one of those perfect-digital sound gurus, I just want some tunes playing. This thing was perfect, and cheap! No, it's not going to light up a concert hall or your entire 6,000 sq. ft. house but if you're looking for something to carry around and produce some sound in a room or at the beach or whatever, this is defniitely worth your cash.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: it is not as good as it was when I first bought it- I ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked very well for about 2 months. Something happened one day, the sound suddenly went down a few notches. Although it is still loud and working, it is not as good as it was when I first bought it- I think a product like this should last longer than 2 months. Also when using Bluetooth, I cannot be more than 2 feet away from the speaker or the music stops. If i open an app or turn away, or move, there is a pause in sound.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany S

customer_reviews.title: Low profile and great sound
customer_reviews.text: Found one of these on clearance in a retail store and decided to purchase it. Loved it so much I wanted to find more to use in other rooms of my home. They're so small you can put them nearly anywhere and hardly notice them. I have one in my kitchen, one in my bedroom, and one in my exercise room. Great sound for such a low profile little thing!
customer_reviews.author: TMD

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: I keep this on my home office desk for listening to music.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: It worked for awhile. it was always a little finicky to sync but it eventually did. But now, I think after an update or something, it won't play loud when syncd with my iPhone or iPad. i can hear that its playing, but only if I put it up to my ear. I've tried fiddling with the settings on my devices but no luck. lame-o because I like having a wireless bluetooth!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good sound for such a small unit
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good sound for such a small unit. I purchased two to tether them with a mini jack in order to achieve wireless stereo. Does. Not. Work. You will need to WIRE them using a Y splitter out of whatever audio device you are running in order to get stereo. So the reality is that they are just a pair of battery operated speakers if you are looking to do stereo. Otherwise if mono is cool with you then you should like these due to the loudness v size as well as their rather remarkable battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Kippian

customer_reviews.title: Ihome speaker
customer_reviews.text: I like it but wanted to connect two of these together and was told there was no way to do that with a wireless bluetooth connection, so don' order two for stereo sound.It is great in a small room, hotel room or student dorm, or an office not great in a large room. It is very easy to set up, and works well with my iPad. I have not experienced any drop outs unless I am using other apps with audio.
customer_reviews.author: VS Video Productions

customer_reviews.title: Not Overwhelmed with Joy
customer_reviews.text: I have had this item for a few months now but have only had occasion to use it a couple times. I'm not sure how I feel about it, but the word is not impressed. Pairing hasn't been easy, with multiple attempts necessary. And the one time I really wanted to use it, the speaker's battery was dead, although it had been charging the day before and I had not used it for a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Lot of sound for such a small device
customer_reviews.text: This is small and sounds quite loud. Of course, you are not going to get premium sound on this, but it is ok for listening casually from your notebook computer and music on the go or at your desk. However, I eventually bought the Bose Bluetooth speaker, because I wanted a much higher quality, but I can still use this for outside or at school (I am a teacher). I like that it is a little bigger than the other comparables in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: kmrotterdam

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker but could have a few more bells and whistles
customer_reviews.text: Great little bluetooth speaker. Improvements that could be made: volume adjustment on the speaker (it's not all that loud even when you turn your iPhone to full blast), and a clearer way of displaying how the product is charging: Is it on? Off? Charging? Is it full? 50% charged? Very hard to tell.
customer_reviews.author: dreweastmead

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine -- Older Model
customer_reviews.text: Product works fine -- but disappointed to find out it is the original model (iDM8), not the updated one (iDM8N1). I already had the newer model and anticipated this would be the same, just a different color. Functionality and buttons are slightly different, haven't noticed a significant difference in sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: David Pierpoint

customer_reviews.title: Handy little speaker, sounds great for the size, battery life is excellent
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift and really have enjoyed using it. It sounds great for the size is very handy for listening to music while working on projects outside and such. The battery life is really excellent, I don't have to charge it to often. It's super easy to pair to the phone.I like it so much I bought a second one as a mother day gift in Mom's favorite color, purple!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Bullard

customer_reviews.title: awesome bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: all i got to do is Sync it once and the wireless speaker will remember my galaxy S3 to play music...you cant put them apart from one bedroom to the deck per say...the speaker needs to have some distance from the phone so it does not glitches the song while playing it. it charges with the same charger as my Galaxy S3 so no complications. the volume is decent and you can definitely hear it clearly. good product!!
customer_reviews.author: Brut

customer_reviews.title: Great for home use, not really loud
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker, easy to connect, good sound. I only wish it was louder. My husband uses this at work in a machine shop and cannot hear the radio well enough to listen to talk radio.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Small and puts out decent sound
customer_reviews.text: I used this a lot last summer to listen to music when out on my deck. I've paired it with all my devices and it works well on all except my Windows 7 laptop (which I think is more a problem with the Bluetooth implementation on the laptop). I was surprised at how small this unit was when I received it---about the size of a baseball. But it puts out enough sound to enjoy outside on our small deck. Lately I've been using it more to listen to podcasts as I get ready for work in the morning since my phone doesn't put out great sound on its own.
customer_reviews.author: BreckJeff

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little speaker. Small enough to fit in a cup holder on the golf course. Sound is what you would expect for the price, good and can get fairly loud. Easily syncs and the battery lasts a really long time between charges. The only thing you need to be careful of is the charging port is sensitive. I take it everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Stipkovich

customer_reviews.title: Love this little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I love this, saw it at work and knew I had to have one. It has become my only speaker in my apartment. Decent sound quality, easy to use and extremely long battery life. I liked it so much I have given as a present.
customer_reviews.author: Edagirl

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, perfect for indoors and out
customer_reviews.text: I use this mainly on my deck with my laptop or iPod. Sounds great, easy to use. Doesn't look too goofy, like some MP3 speakers. You have to be a little careful changing volume, as those buttons are opposite the power button and you kind of have to grab opposite sides to adjust, but it works great and holds a charge a long time.
customer_reviews.author: apljacker

customer_reviews.title: a great investment for many. Ideal for apartment living and listening on the go.
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on cheaper versions of this product. It is a great item, easy-to-use and very useful, depending on your specific listening needs. I was irritated that there were no volume buttons, since my friend with the same product has volume buttons on theirs. you can only control volume with the device, but it is sufficiently loud, again, depending on your specific needs and wants from a speaker.
customer_reviews.author: joey

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: I was so surprised that this little ball had such a big sound. I had some minor issues setting up the bluetooth, but that was mostly because I am so bad with technology. My boyfriend managed to take care of it within 5 minutes. After we started listening to it, he thought "Wow I want to get one of these too!"
customer_reviews.author: Annie G.

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, Not Very loud
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solid little device. It produces good sounds but not a lot of it. It is built well and I was able to get about 12-14 hours out of each charge. Pros Micro USB charger Good sound Compact Build Quality Cons Not loud enough (good for indoor or sitting around a table outside)
customer_reviews.author: chaos

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, Very pleased, Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Have had this iHome for over a year and it has not failed, and I play my music as loud as it can go. Despite having dropping it several times it still has amazing sound. This is one sturdy speaker perfect for a home with children, animals or clumsy people.
customer_reviews.author: ksimbap

customer_reviews.title: Boost for Listening
customer_reviews.text: This small speaker produces a good quality sound. I purchased this because my wife has a hearing loss and when I play sound only from my laptop or ipad it is not loud enough. It's small and easy to use. When placed in the middle of a room it fills the air with clear sound. I first heard this speaker when a college rep gave a presentation to my students. Everyone in the room was impressed and said they will soon look into purchasing this speaker. You will be amazed at the sound quality! Price was also affordable!
customer_reviews.author: James Pujdowski

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This paired easily with my i phone 4S and puts out good sound for a speaker this small. It isn't a boom box, and if your looking to crank it up really loud you will want to go with something larger. I also use it as a speaker for my laptop and its nice to not have cords running everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: AK Al

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wireless speaker. It works with my iPhone and Mac Book Pro. I use it mostly to listen to audiobooks on my phone and for the capibility to listen to my laptop with a louder speaker. I think it works great! I like the heavy feel of it and it was very easy to set up. Good product for the price... so far!
customer_reviews.author: Luv 2 read

customer_reviews.title: iHome IDM8B Bluetooth Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I have had a lot of fun with this. I have connected it to my phone, my Nexus 7, and my laptop computer. Great sound, good battery life, and just good sound. After trying it out we gave one to one of our grandchildren. It's a good size for carrying around although it won't fit in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Riker

customer_reviews.title: Love my portable music
customer_reviews.text: Easy to connect to my android smart phone and move around, quick and easy are the features. The sound is very good to my flat ears, I'm a casual music listener and in most such locations background and acoustics would degrade even the best speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you need solid, inexpensive blutooth solution.
customer_reviews.text: A little background - I am not one of those guys who claims he can hear a mosquito fart in a studio recorded song. I bought this speaker for my Ford F150 SuperCrew which has no auxiliary connection. Speaker to be blutooth paired to my iPad. This speaker gets it done. I set my iPad volume at just below half, set the speaker in the gauge pod left of the steering column. All gauges can be seen less "charging" gauge, but the tip of the pointe can be seen. Sounds very nice, music clear, blutooth engages quickly as promised. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Martin L. Klein

customer_reviews.title: wireless speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is awesome, I gave it to my son and he loves it. He uses it with his phone while he's playing golf. He said it fits in the cup holder on his golf bag perfectly. So their group rocks out on the golf course.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this! It is easy to use and works wonderfully all over my house. The sound quality is great and i have never tried to see how loud it can go because it is plenty loud without an earsplitting experiment of testing its limits. No problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: jstevens

customer_reviews.title: No longer strong can hardly hear it.
customer_reviews.text: Had this unit since Feb. 2013 still sounds great for size, love the blue tooth feature. Update no longer has any volume. If buying new recommended but not used don’t last.
customer_reviews.author: Butch

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice little gadgets for a lap-top computer. I think most lap-top computers and tablets have very low volume and poor sound quality. With this remote speaker sound is much clear and louder. Music also sounds well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Gavassa V.

customer_reviews.title: Ihome IDM8B Bluetooth Speakers
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great for a tiny speaker and it is highly portable. My unit did not come with a volume control. In fact, volume control is not mentioned in any ad that I viewed, new or used. I can control the volume from my Ipad so it is not a major problem. I was just surprised to learn that my unit was different from my daughters who bought the new unit as opposed to used which is slightly updated.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Miller

customer_reviews.title: Handy Dandy
customer_reviews.text: I like this one for travel. Fits easily into by briefcase. Sound, while not a Bose, surely beats that of my iPhone or iPad. Great for listening to talk radio, the news or MLB, and not bad for music. I am pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: thunefeld

customer_reviews.title: It's a pretty good little speaker
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty good little speaker, and very portable! Sometimes I accidentally turn it off, though, as the controls aren't very well placed. Minor inconvenience, though.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: We enjoyed this handy wireless speaker system. It had rather good sound for its size. Within about a month and a half, the charging port broke loose and wound up on the inside of the ball (inaccessible). We looked into returning it to the manufacturer but by the time we paid the shipping and the fees set by the manufacturer, it would have been cheaper to buy a new one. Nice while it lasted but poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Hamby

customer_reviews.title: Great for the garden or deck
customer_reviews.text: Tiny but great to bring down to the garden or to put on the deck while enjoying the outdoors. The speaker sounds tinny when you hold it (turning it on) but once placed it sounds good. (The hummingbirds even approached it as it sat on the railing of my deck!) Good deal for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A. Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: This item is very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This item is very easy to use, the bluetooth works well. The sound is also good and it's so convenient to travel with. It is a great product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Azaelia

customer_reviews.title: Great description, product
customer_reviews.text: Great description, product, and service. Perfect size,interesting shape, does all that you want, and great sound. Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianita Marisol

customer_reviews.title: The speaker has amazing quality sound and it syncs right away to your ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for my brother and he loves it! The speaker has amazing quality sound and it syncs right away to your phone with no problems. I already had a black one and older verzion of it and I love it. Mine still works perfect til this day and I've had it for over a year I would say. Great product and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Sound great and the Bluetooth function on this small device is just wonderful! In fact, it can be used in the car for road-trips as well! I'm very satisfied with this product!
customer_reviews.author: C. Tiefel

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Gives really great sound, even when the volume is turned up. Never sounds like you're about to blow out the speaker. Love the color!
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is awesome. Puts out so much sound for a little thing. It was a Christmas gift for my son because the docks always cause a problem with phone cases.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker. Probably not the best sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker. Probably not the best sound quality, but it's great to have around the house, and to be able to connect to my phone's Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Jen B.H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this little speaker. So convenient! Really holds a charge, too!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy B

customer_reviews.title: Bad Bluetooth range.
customer_reviews.text: This thing has poor Bluetooth reception. I can't be over 15 feet with this thing. I got another one and claimed the first was defective but the second one is just as bad. Really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Better products out there to choose from.
customer_reviews.text: Buttons often to not work without pressing 'em over and over. Bluetooth works with some effort. Quality of sound is so-so.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dotson

customer_reviews.title: it's a very good speaker for the size and price
customer_reviews.text: it's a very good speaker for the size and price, don't expect it to work well in open spaces, but for her room is pretty good
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL G.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: This is great! The quality was so much better than I was expecting. I bought this as a gift but will be purchasing one for myself as it was brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: km2612

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sound.
customer_reviews.text: Long lasting battery.. I would say this is the best "portable, price, battery life, convenience, wireless/corded, Bluetooth" speaker there is.. I'm sure they have better speakers. But not for all the qualities this one has.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound!
customer_reviews.text: The bass coming out of this small ball is more than you would expect. Rechargeable, bluetooth or wired - great for youtubes or just music.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Buyer

customer_reviews.title: The sound isn't very great, the bluetooth is a bit iffy on it
customer_reviews.text: The sound isn't very great, the bluetooth is a bit iffy on it. I would recommend a Bose if you want quality
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Totally worthless
customer_reviews.text: Totally worthless. This speaker didn't even take the initial charge bay either my computer USB port or a USB charger.
customer_reviews.author: J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: this sat in the trunck of my car still there two years later
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: I Use it Everyday
customer_reviews.text: I always find any excuse to use this speaker. It delivers loud crisp sound with no booming bass that'll disturb neighbors. This was a great deal! I will be buying more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Dante Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great sound from such a tiny thing
customer_reviews.text: It was really simple to pair it with my iPhone and has some great sound! I love that it doesn't have to stay plugged up to anything
customer_reviews.author: AshleyBKK

customer_reviews.title: Nice little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thing just so that I could listen to some music while outside grilling, hanging-out, and drinking beer without having to blast my home stereo system and making the neighbors mad. Sounds pretty good (especially for the price)! Also works well when I go golfing...just sit it in the cup-holder; then grip and rip
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Maddox

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: sounds great and very convenient. Bluetooth setup is easy, or connect hard wired. not much more to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jban

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Sound is really crystal clear and great. Easy to work blue tooth. Small and compact but light Enjoy the sound
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: This speakers works well for me. Has reasonable sound quality and volume. I use it on our deck to play from my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the price. Stays charged for longer than rating. Small enough to hide on book shelves out of site.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Big volume with decent sound quality for the price. Easy to sync with my IPad. Just what I was hoping it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Curtner

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker. FIlls the whole room with clear sound. Wish there was a little more bass but overall it's a great speaker w/ great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing the sound that comes out of this little speaker, great volume, battery last long between charges, makes my iPad so much more now.
customer_reviews.author: Dale D. Tahner

customer_reviews.title: it has great sound.
customer_reviews.text: bought this for a friend. He loves it, it has great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Gonna buy another - just waiting for the right deal because it was one of the refurbs that I got
customer_reviews.author: Woody Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have a red one and my sister loved it, so since she loves purple, this one is for her
customer_reviews.author: Angela V. Martin

customer_reviews.title: very cool
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 13 year old son and he loves it! Great sound for the price, and the range is great also
customer_reviews.author: Amy T....

customer_reviews.title: iHome round speaker
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. Sound is good, small, cool shape. Easily fits in my purse, on the countertop, by my Kindle/
customer_reviews.author: L N Perdue

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the sound is really poor for the price that I paid.
customer_reviews.author: MARICUSA

customer_reviews.title: BOUGHT FOR GRANDDAUGHTER
customer_reviews.text: iI bought this for my granddaughter for her laptop, iPhone and whatever else she has! It has great sound and can be a good distance away from laptop, etc. Very happy with this speaker
customer_reviews.author: Libralee

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound I have to re sync it every time but that is probably user error.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Could be louder,hardly any bass and the speaker quality is subpar at best
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: I am happy because it is just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is so loud...I am happy because it is just what I wanted. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: mstt

customer_reviews.title: great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Co-worker had one and I wanted my own I loved it so much!!!! Have recommended to several people very impressed
customer_reviews.author: sandy v

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient, handy, can use it every where.i can use with my phone and my tablet. I like the color assortment too
customer_reviews.author: ABW

customer_reviews.title: We are very glad we got it
customer_reviews.text: This is quite the little bit of magic for listening to u-tube. We do a lot with u-tube for singing and could never hear it very well on the computer but now it is clear as a bell. We are very glad we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Zurbuchen

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed with lack of volume control.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one at a local drug store and love it. I use it a lot. But the one I ordered for a friend, despite having the same model iDM8 (but with a "b" added), does not have any volume +/- buttons, and his android is "all or nothing" as well. As a result, he can only use it "too loud" and can't adjust. I love iDM8. I wouldn't bother with the iDM8b.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy R. Ottinger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, i have it on my desk and ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, i have it on my desk and it plays all day with the smoothest sound. Great product. Excellent Service
customer_reviews.author: christine steadman

customer_reviews.title: Dead in two weeks
customer_reviews.text: Died in two weeks. Next time, I'm buying one locally. Then, if I have a problem, I can take care of it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Langlois 1604

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband used this for a month and than it died.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: SATISFIED AND SUPER LOUD SPEAKER
customer_reviews.text: I SO LOVED THIS PRODUCT, COLOR AND OVERALL THE PRICE THAT INCLUDED FREE SHIPPING. IN ADDITION, RECEIVED IT WITHIN A WEEK. GREATLY SATISFIED. OH, AND IT IS SUPER LOUD SPEAKER.
customer_reviews.author: il0vesh0ppiN'

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It only works for few days, sounds become unclear, this product could be defective
customer_reviews.author: boring

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I use it everyday when I am cleaning, taking a shower, or getting ready to hangout. Very nice sound and volume.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Sound
customer_reviews.text: These are the best portable speakers I've ever owned. Great look and feel and pretty good range...not to mention impressive sound for Mono. A solid buy!
customer_reviews.author: pthomas1014

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for such a small item
customer_reviews.text: My 11 yr, old son bought this and really loves it! He loves music and this little thing delivers. He is very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Doc J

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: the only thing i dont like about it is that it dies super quickly. other than that it is really loud. good for its size
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Good Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Good speaker for the price. Not bulky but sound is good! I love that it can connect to your phone so you can listen to pandora, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Raglin

customer_reviews.title: iHome
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for such a small round object. It is good for the bedroom or just around the house to enhance your laptop or ipad volume.
customer_reviews.author: G. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Good Little Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Very cool. For the price, and for my purposes, it has a great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Gordon

customer_reviews.title: I really like this wireless
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two different iHome wireless products. I purchased oneon Amazon and the other at a store in Texas. I accidently left one at the airport going through security and now have to purchase another one. I see it comes in red so I'll be ordering the same one but in red! Great sound for the size!!
customer_reviews.author: It's Bri

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker
customer_reviews.text: I would give it five stars, but I was hoping for a little better battery life. I'm only getting about four hours in a charge.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Compact Speaker with Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought this speaker for my teenage daughter. She loves it! It's compact and fits in her hand, and has powerful, clear sound.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, works perfect and very happy with it. Only thing was, it didnt come with a charger. Overall for what i paid for it, its great.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: bluetooth had to be really close and wasn't at all loud.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sound
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker packs a punch. It has nice sound and bass. It's also very easy to use. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Aiyejorun

customer_reviews.title: just okay
customer_reviews.text: Its cute and convenient. the bass is not so good. The sound is still quite low, but for the size it is decent.
customer_reviews.author: tessB

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Nice range, sound, and battery life. We use it often! Also sturdy, have dropped it several times and it keeps on ticking!
customer_reviews.author: Jay G.

customer_reviews.title: great deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker used and it worked great. I paid half the price of its original price. This product most definitely met my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Jay-P

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I like a lot perfect size very easy to connect, except its not loud enough for me when i take it outside the house if your inside your house its ok.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

product_meta.title: iHome iDM8B Bluetooth Wireless Speaker
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Product Packaging:Standard Packaging

IHOME RECHARGEABLE PORTABLE BLUETOOTH SPEAKER IDM8
The iDM8 offers a world of sound. The spherical rechargeable mono speaker with Bluetooth and speakerphone capability looks and sounds great anywhere. This speaker features a specially designed high-end driver that delivers astounding clarity, depth, and power. The featured SRS TruBass has built-in SRS TruBass circuitry that enhances all your audio: music, apps, games, and more.

AWESOME AUDIO FROM A VARIETY OF DEVICES
The speaker provides crisp sound that's perfect for your music, games or apps. An auto-pairing and-linking feature makes Bluetooth setup simple and fast. With the featured Bluetooth wireless capability, iPad, iPhone, iPod and other Bluetooth devices can connect and play music wirelessly through the speaker unit. The iDM8 includes a cable for charging speakers and connecting to audio source. This 2-in-1 cable has USB plug for charging the speaker and an audio plug to connect it to another audio source.

TAKE THIS SPEAKER ANYWHERE!
The built-in lithium-ion battery is rechargeable, so you can enjoy music on the go without worrying about batteries. The rechargeable battery can be charged while the speaker is in use.





ADDITIONAL FEATURES:
 * Rechargeable built-in lithium ion battery for portable use
 * Travel lock to save battery life, preserve settings during travel
 * iDM8 System
 * USB/3.5 mm audio to micro USB 2-in-1 cable for charging, aux audio
feature_bullets: Wirelessly stream music within 30 feet (10 meters) from your Bluetooth-enabled phone, iPad, PDA, computer or other device
Auto-link for fast, easy Bluetooth setup
2-in-1 USB/3.5 mm audio to micro USB cable included for aux audio and charging the battery from your computer
Plays audio from audio devices equipped with 3.5mm headphone jack (cable included); SRS TruBass circuitry
